title: Gme Crash
body: My game crashed and i saw some people has same problem too that happened after your new patch. because of your patch bug i got leaving game  punishment and lost lp so lost my league TY Riot Ty for your bugs

replies.body: Sorry to hear about the leave, and I'd like to help!  Can you toss some more details my way about what you mean by crash?  For example, did you get any error messages?  Let me know, happy to help.
